q1: This team is one of my favorite
a1: I like Schalke 04 much more though.
q2: Are you excited for Reus to be captain?
q3: I think he deserves to be the captain
a3: Do you think he will play worse if he is not captain?
q4: I would say yes, since the captain knows and knows all about the players
a4: BVB Dortmund is a close group. Any changes would jeopardize that.
q5: How long has he been captain of BVB Dortmund?
a5: Reus has been playing for BVB Dortmund since 2012 and has been captain for a little shorter than that.
